definition: Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: a tapir found in Malaya and Sumatra.
sentences.chinese: 產於馬來半島和蘇門答臘島的貘。

sentences.english: porcupine of Borneo and Sumatra having short spines and a long tail.
sentences.chinese: 產於婆羅洲和蘇門答臘島的短刺長尾豪豬。

sentences.english: The new case is the first from Lampung Province on the island of Sumatra.
sentences.chinese: 這是蘇門答臘島楠榜省第1例新病例。

sentences.english: Sumatra itself is part of an island arc.
sentences.chinese: 蘇門答臘島本身就是島弧的一部分。

sentences.english: Fadli is also suspected of involvement in a bank robbery on Indonesia's Sumatra island.
sentences.chinese: 法德利還涉嫌參與了印尼蘇門答臘島的銀行搶劫。
